info.name: Lichess / Pychess: Kaneo pieces
info.description: Kaneo piece set for Lichess, inspired by chess.com's Neo pieces. Chess.com's green board style is included, to use it, set the board style to 'green' on Lichess.
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE 21 March 21st: dropped pychess support, because there are a lot of variants and pieces wherewith this userstyle would not work properly.

UPDATE March 20th: border color fix for some pieces; added gray board

Made by: Ka
Github: https://github.com/Ka-hu
